about.name: Annecy
about.info_text: Annecy is a charming town nestled in the French Alps, known for its stunning Alpine scenery, pristine lake, and well-preserved medieval architecture. With its nickname 'Venice of the Alps,' Annecy boasts scenic canals, colorful houses, and charming streets. Visitors can explore the historic old town, relax by Lake Annecy, and enjoy various outdoor activities, including hiking, cycling, and water sports.
about.facts_text:
Population: Approximately 50,000
Country: France
Time Zone: Central European Time (CET, UTC+1)
Language: French
Currency: Euro (EUR)

attractions_card.title: Palais de l'Isle
attractions_card.description: Visit the iconic Palais de l'Isle, a medieval palace that has served as a prison and lordly residence.

attractions_card.title: Lake Annecy
attractions_card.description: Enjoy the crystal-clear waters of Lake Annecy, surrounded by mountains, for swimming, boating, and picnics.

attractions_card.title: Château d'Annecy
attractions_card.description: Explore Château d'Annecy, a historic castle overlooking the town and offering panoramic views of the lake and mountains.

attractions_card.title: Annecy Old Town
attractions_card.description: Stroll through Annecy's picturesque old town with its narrow canals, colorful buildings, and charming cafés.

food_card.title: Tartiflette
food_card.description: Savor Tartiflette, a hearty Savoyard dish made with potatoes, reblochon cheese, lardons, and onions.

food_card.title: Raclette
food_card.description: Indulge in Raclette, a famous melted cheese dish served with potatoes, pickles, and cured meats.

food_card.title: Croissant aux Amandes
food_card.description: Enjoy a Croissant aux Amandes, a sweet pastry filled with almond cream, popular in the region.

hotels_card.title: L'Impérial Palace
hotels_card.description: Stay at L'Impérial Palace, a luxurious hotel and spa located on the shores of Lake Annecy.

hotels_card.title: Hôtel du Palais de l'Isle
hotels_card.description: Experience a unique stay at Hôtel du Palais de l'Isle, a charming hotel in a historic building.

hotels_card.title: Auberge du Lyonnais
hotels_card.description: Enjoy the cozy ambiance of Auberge du Lyonnais, a traditional Savoyard inn in the heart of Annecy.

transport_card.title: Annecy Railway Station
transport_card.description: Arrive in Annecy via the Annecy Railway Station, connecting the town to major cities in France.

transport_card.title: Annecy Buses
transport_card.description: Use the Annecy bus network for convenient transportation within the town and its surroundings.
